definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
dead weight/weight capacity of a vehicle

sentences.english: Made of specially-treated material, the coat is light in weight and machine washable.
sentences.chinese: 该大衣由经过特殊处理的面料做成，重量轻，可机洗。

sentences.english: They're weighed and fed automatically into mixers.
sentences.chinese: 用料称好重量之后，被自动送入搅拌机中。

sentences.english: Well, we ended up walloping them. We took every weight class.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们最终大败他们，赢得了所有重量级的比赛。

sentences.english: Weights shown for ball valve figures are PVC threaded models.
sentences.chinese: 表中所显示的重量适用于PVC螺纹连接的球阀。

sentences.english: In eccentric type of IV enlargement, the LVMI was increased.
sentences.chinese: 左室离心性扩张型的左室重量指数增加。

sentences.english: They built a crane capable of lifting 150 tons.
sentences.chinese: 他们造了一台能吊起150吨重量的吊车。

sentences.english: The black plastic will help seal and the weight of the door holds it down.
sentences.chinese: 黑色塑料膜的作用是密封，而门的重量会把它压住。

sentences.english: The personal clothing of this soldier of the future would be lightweight with a bullet-proof jacket.
sentences.chinese: 未来士兵的服装重量将更轻，并装备防弹背心。

sentences.english: I think my inspection is just some sort of formality.
sentences.chinese: 我要告诉我的客户，当不走过场起重重量。

sentences.english: One copy of inspection Report on Quantity and Quality issued SGS at loading port.
sentences.chinese: 装货港SGS数量及重量检验报告，一份副本。

sentences.english: Can he weigh out the feather-soft heart of maiden?
sentences.chinese: 少女羽毛般轻柔的心，他能掂出重量吗？

sentences.english: Your shipment of goods has been found short in weight by re-inspection.
sentences.chinese: 经再次检验发现贵方装运的货物重量短缺了。

sentences.english: An end group correction factor was introduced for getting the true weight distribution of chain length.
sentences.chinese: 引进了一个端基改正因子以获得真实的重量链长分布。

sentences.english: The product that combines aluminum and resin is non-breakable and light.
sentences.chinese: 该产品结合了铝和树脂是不易碎，重量轻。

sentences.english: Zeng Fanzhi is undoubtedly one of the most important Chinese contemporary artists to date.
sentences.chinese: 曾梵志无疑是中国当代最重量级的画家之一。

sentences.english: Although both African elephant sexes have tusks , there are large differences in size and weight.
sentences.chinese: 尽管非洲雌雄象都有长牙，但长度和重量有很大区别。

definition: to sustain/to bear the weight (of the upper storeys in architecture)/load-bearing
(lit. and fig.) to carry a heavy load/to carry a heavy burden
dead weight/weight capacity of a vehicle
